QuestData.Title: Report to Bombgutz
QuestData.Description: We must prepare for the impending attack. I will have our soldiers prepare the bomb for transport. I want you to report to Chief Blastgineer Bombgutz. She has been working to fix our anti-air cannons, but has thus far failed. Make sure that she is properly motivated to repair our guns, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Chief Blastgineer Bombgutz at Krom'gar Fortress in Stonetalon Mountains.
